title: Payday.2.Update.FIX-KaOs
description:
Payday.2.Update.FIX-KaOs incl all updates

This 993MEG Patch Simply Restores The Game Archives Back To There Original Form
Reversing Any Modifications We Made, So People Who Feel The Need To Update The Game Still Can,
And Hopefully Saving People Time & Bandwidth Downloading An Iso Or A Already Updated Version.

This Patch Contains No Updates And Should Be Installed Over A Clean Install Of Our Original Release.
(Payday.2-KaOs)

Instructions:

1: Unrar To Your Payday 2 Root Folder Overwriting Files If Needed.
2: Run ~unpack~.bat As Administrator.
3: You Can Now Start Adding The Updates Without Them Failing.

once you installed our update fix you can then install the game updates it has to be done in order

1: PAYDAY.2.Update.1-FTS
2: PAYDAY.2.Update.2-FTS
3: PAYDAY.2.Update.2.HOTFIX-FTS
4: PAYDAY.2.Update.3-FTS

and online crack included aswell PAYDAY.2.Steamworks.Fix.Proper.V2-RVTFiX
